Key Match Events: The Cavaliers recovered from a poor first half to beat the Warriors handily
Post-Match Reflections: The Cavaliers won their 28th game of the season with a thorough pulling away in the second half to beat the Golden State Warriors 113-95
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cavaliers do not need Wade to put the team on his back for them to win
Niang has his nights where he can vanish and with limited shot attempts, tonight was another one of those occasions
Others: The Cavaliers' offense was in dire need of turning things around in the second half
The Warriors are a smaller team so you would have liked to see Mobley carry the aggressiveness over from the Nuggets game
